body:
Hey guys, it's Enflaming here, and I have a problem. As some of you know, my steam was hijacked, and steam support sucks, so I don't think I'm getting it back. :/ Soooo... I need your help! I have a plan, where people who play CS:GO can donate a gun skin to someone trustworthy who can then buy CS:GO and gift it to my new account. You don't have to (of course), but extra skins you don't need helps!

If you can hold the skins, please say so below. 
And no, this isn't a scam or anything. My account was hijacked somehow, and I need to get CS:GO again.
body_tagged:

title: I need your help!

replies.body: I have several skins on csgo(like 5) and I don't see the point of them, but if theyll help add me on steam DWIC, I'm in the avicus group and msg me as to who to donate them too.
replies.body_tagged: I have several skins on csgo(like 5) and I don't see the point of them, but if theyll help add me on steam DWIC, I'm in the avicus group and msg me as to who to donate them too.

replies.body: JJ, if you still have access to the account, I can help you box out the hijacker, and regain control.
replies.body_tagged: JJ, if you still have access to the account, I can help you box out the hijacker, and regain control.

replies.body: I don't have any access to it. The guy changed the email and password. But thanks. :/
replies.body_tagged: I don't have any access to it. The guy changed the email and password. But thanks. :/
